FuncDef: The display debugging packet all command displays whether debugging information about all protocol packets is displayed and the timeout period for displaying debugging information. The display debugging packet all command displays whether debugging information about all protocol packets is displayed and the timeout period for displaying debugging information.
Examples: [Y] : The packet of specified type will display
ExtraInfo: After the following operations are performed, you can run the display debugging packet all command to check whether debugging information about all protocol packets is displayed and the timeout period for displaying debugging information:
